filename.description: filename to use when reading from stdin - this will be used in source-maps, errors etc

moduleId.description: specify a custom name for module ids

retainLines.description: retain line numbers - will result in really ugly code

nonStandard.description: enable/disable support for JSX and Flow (on by default)

highlightCode.description: enable/disable ANSI syntax highlighting of code frames (on by default)

stage.description: ECMAScript proposal stage version to allow [0-4]

blacklist.description: blacklist of transformers to NOT use

whitelist.description: whitelist of transformers to ONLY use

optional.description: list of optional transformers to enable

moduleIds.description: insert an explicit id for modules

loose.description: list of transformers to enable loose mode ON

jsxPragma.description: custom pragma to use with JSX (same functionality as @jsx comments)

ignore.description: list of glob paths to **not** compile

only.description: list of glob paths to **only** compile

comments.description: strip/output comments in generated output (on by default)

compact.description: do not include superfluous whitespace characters and line terminators [true|false|auto]

keepModuleIdExtensions.description: keep extensions when generating module ids

auxiliaryComment.description: attach a comment before all helper declarations and auxiliary code

externalHelpers.description: uses a reference to `babelHelpers` instead of placing helpers at the top of your code.

sourceRoot.description: the root from which all sources are relative

moduleRoot.description: optional prefix for the AMD module formatter that will be prepend to the filename on module definitions

babelrc.description: do not load the same .babelrc file twice
